eurecom.spacegraph

Class SpaceGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_stuttgart.informatik.canu.mobisim.core.ExtensionModule
      • eurecom.spacegraph.SpaceGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationListener, XMLStreamable

    public class SpaceGraph
extends ExtensionModule
    This class is used to randomly generate a Spatial Model out of a random voronoi tesselation and random attributes/
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jerome Haerri

      • act

        public int act()
        Executes the extension.

        The method is called on every simulation timestep.
        Specified by:
        act in class ExtensionModule
        Returns:
        0 - the module should be executed on next timesteps, -1 - the module should not be executed on further timesteps and should be removed from the extensions' list

      • createLineFeatureElements

        protected void createLineFeatureElements()
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs elements from loaded voronoi edges.

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception if more than 4 coordinates per roadElement

      • createPointFeatureElements

        protected void createPointFeatureElements()
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs elements from loaded obstacle features

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception if more than 2 coordinates per obstacle

      • createFirstLayerElements

        protected void createFirstLayerElements()
        Constructs simple elements from random data This method creates junctions and road elements. It also creates simple traffic signs and lights such as multidirectional Stop or Yield signs. We let the createSecondLayerElements() method create more complex traffic signs since we would need access to the graph powerful methods.

      • getDirections

        public boolean getDirections()
        Access method:
        Returns:
        1 : if streets have differentiated flows 0 : if streets do not have differentiated flows

      • getClustersDim

        protected double[] getClustersDim(double clustersDensity)
        Compute the common X-Y dimensions of each cluster given the simulation area and the density of clusters.

        Parameters:
        clustersDensity - density of clusters per 1000*1000 squared area.
        Returns:
        double[] an array containing the number of clusters and their X-Y dimension.

      • generateClusters

        protected void generateClusters(org.w3c.dom.NodeList clusterList,
                                double clustersDensity)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Generates the clusters of obstacles given the XML input file.

        Parameters:
        clusterList - XML input file
        clustersDensity - density of clusters per 1000*1000 squared area.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception if XML tags are missing, if the total ratio of clusters is not 1, or if the number of generated clusters is not equal to the one desired in the input file.

      • generateRandomClusters

        protected void generateRandomClusters(double clustersDensity)
        Randomly generates the clusters of obstacles.

        Parameters:
        clustersDensity - density of clusters per 1000*1000 squared area.

      • setClusters

        Set the clusters of obstacles in the simulation area.

                                      throws java.lang.Exception

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception
        See Also:
